text: Jacobus Teunis "Koos" van den Berg (18 September 1942 â€“ 21 April 2020) was a Dutch politician. He was born in The Hague. He was a member of the Reformed Political Party (SGP). He served as a member of the House of Representatives from 1986 to 2002. On 21 April 2020, during the COVID-19 pandemic, van den Berg died due to the disease. He was 77. ==References== Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in the Netherlands Category:Dutch Calvinists Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Politicians from The Hague Category:Reformed Political Party politicians
title: Koos van den Berg
